attributes.action: Exit the E.U. and scrap its unhelpful laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exit the E.U. and scrap its unhelpful laws, as these laws are destroying our country. Exiting the E.U. will also stop immigration problems!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
